attributes.title: Unlocking the Sahasrara Chakra - Audio Discourse - Ananda Spurana Program
attributes.description: In this rare audio discourse (24 November 2002), His Divine Holiness, Sri Nithyananda Paramashivam reveals the ultimate technique to unlock and energize the Sahasrara Chakra as part of the Ananda Apurana Program (ASP)  - The first ever powerful Chakra-based Meditation program designed and conducted personally by Swamiji Himself in 2002. Chakras are energy centers in us, whose well-being reflect our physical, mental and spiritual well-being. Lakhs of people have attended and benefitted from this program and continue to practice the meditation techniques taught through this program till date.
